layout.name: turns
layout.title: Turns Around
layout.tooltip: Does the NPC turn around after every jump? (Creates a back-forth movement). Only affects the cheep cheep if using dolphin movement.

layout.name: jumpHeight
layout.title: Jump Height
layout.tooltip: If using Dolphin Vertical, Dolphin Horizontal (Short) or Dolphin Horizontal (Long) then this will influence its jump height.

layout.name: moveNumbers
layout.title: Move Distance Per Jump
layout.tooltip: A set of numbers will determine how far it will jump when using Pond Hop.
